lexUnit.name: give out.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: give freely (to a large number of recipients).

sentence.text: • Police in Paris gave out more than 170,000 driving offence tickets last year with some 78,000 for signal violations , 24,000 fines for motorcyclists riding without helmets , 2300 for speeding and 3500 for drink-driving .
